profile:
Mr. Handyman provides professional repair, maintenance and renovation services to residential and commercial clients.  Our insured Service Technicians are employees with an average of 8 to 10 years off experience who receive regular company training, which ensures consistent, quality work that's done right the first time, every time.
***
Mr. Handyman Technicians arrive in nationally-recognized uniforms and branded vans that are stocked with every tool they'll need to complete the required work.  You will not have to interrupt your day's activities, or waste valuable time waiting for Mr. Handyman. Our on-time record is second to none, and we arrive ready to work.
name: Mr Handyman of Burnaby, New Westminster & N Vancouver

profile: BPM Electric has been servicing BCâ€™s Lower Mainland since 1987. Our fully trained Surrey Electricians have a passion for excellence and a desire to leave our clients happy. We work all over the Lower Mainland, focusing on Langley and Surrey. We are always available to serve all of your needs. As a licensed, bonded and insured company, we provide professional quality service. Customer satisfaction is our number one priority.
service_area:
Our Vancouver and Surrey Electricians can provide Electrical Services and Installations to most areas in the Lower Mainland. BPM Electric is available to the following cities:
Surrey, Langley, Abbotsford, Aldergrove, South Surrey, White Rock, Delta, Maple Ridge, Pitt Meadows, Vancouver, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Richmond, Burnaby, New Westminster, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody
services:
Whether its Lighting Installation or a Complete Home Rewiring, our professional Electrician Experts can handle any job big or small.
Home Services:
Lighting Installation
Electrical Panel Repairs, Installs or Maintenance
Electrical Sub Panel Install, Repairs or Maintenance 
Home Wiring or Rewiring
Electrical Outlet Installations or repairs
Renovations

Commercial Services:
Code updates
Electrical system upgrades
Lighting maintenance and design
Troubleshooting
Landscape and security lighting
Energy-saving solutions
specialities: At BPM we specialize in home renovations. We take great pride in creating the beautiful new look for your home. As customer satisfaction is our priority, we as a team enjoy seeing our happy customers after we help to update their homes. Whether it be modernizing an old bathroom, or updating a kitchen, we here at BPM will never disappoint our valued customers.

profile:
Customer Service Is My #1 Priority. I Treat Your Home Like It Is My Own. 

We Have Full Liability Insurance & WCB Coverage. We Are Also Bonded. With Over 27 Years Experience You Can Rest Assured Your Job Is Done Right And On Budget, The First Time. All Work Is Done To Your Satisfaction.

Awarded Best Handyman In Surrey By BUILD 2019 Home And Garden Awards.
